title: NEKOPARA Vol. 0
notes: Stable at 60 FPS. Working Steam overlay. Locale needs to be set to Japanese to get proper font (the one used in the story text). Workaround is the usual, LC_ALL=ja_JP.UTF-8 %command% as the launch option.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
title: NEKOPARA Vol. 0

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.12-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes:
Works perfectly fine. If you play the game with Japanese and English text ensure you have the proper charset installed otherwise you'll get boxes. English text works perfectly fine.

Chances are if this volume works the rest will as well.
